pageContext.claim: “[Mexico has] only had one week in June, and June was down 28 percent. One week. Two thousand soldiers, they started with. Now they have 6,000 soldiers on their southern border. You know, they used to have like three soldiers; they had nobody.”
pageContext.analysis: It’s not clear if the entire drop can be attributed to the presence of Mexican soldiers. There is generally a drop during the hot summer months.
